'''Classic Fir Cabinet''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Classic Fir Cabinet is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Fir Wood = 12
|sort = Fir Wood
